Title: The Legend of Muay Thai: 9 Satra
Director: Pongsa Kornsri, Gun Phansuwon, Nat Yoswatananont
Writer: Nat Yoswatananont (screenplay), Bryan Edward Hill (screenplay), Daraka Wongsiri (screenplay), Nat Yoswatananont (story), Suphakorn Riansuwan (story)
Actors: Kanokchat Manyaton, Savitree Suttichanond, Sirichai Charoenkijtanakul, Rachphol Yamsaeng
Plot: With "Ott" father's last hope to take back Ramthep City where is now occupy by Asura (Giant Race), the boy was trained the martial art of Muay Thai for the mission of delivering 9 Satra, ...
